originalText.text: Let me start by saying that my experience with Manhattan Dental Spa from the beginning was amazing. I was looking for a dentist in the city because I was experiencing discomfort so I picked them from my google search. I called and spoke to Genesis who was very helpful and professional and set me up with an appointment the same week. I arrived at my appointment for 3pm and the staff was really pleasant to talk with. They signed me in and went right in to get worked on no waiting around. The staff that did my X-ray was professional and gentle with me. Then the doctor came in and went over my X-ray and a quick check and told me exactly what has to get done and gave me options for the future. I then proceeded over to get my cleaning done and let me tell you she was the best I didn‚Äôt even flinch once. She was professional, gentle and I can tell from her performance she really enjoy and takes pride in her work. I must say my teeth and I have found a new home thank you all at Manhattan Dental Spa I would recommend to anyone looking for a dentist you guys are 100% the place üòÅ

originalText.text: I recently discovered Manhattan Dental Spa through ZocDoc and I must say that they exceeded my expectations. All staff members, including the front desk personnel, were friendly and provided excellent service. I highly recommend them for all your dental needs.

text.text: I recently discovered Manhattan Dental Spa through ZocDoc and I must say that they exceeded my expectations. All staff members, including the front desk personnel, were friendly and provided excellent service. I highly recommend them for all your dental needs.

originalText.text: The absolute best dental spa. Not only is the entire team fabulous, but each and every person goes above and beyond to make sure you are happy and satisfied with your smile. The attention to detail and level of expertise are unmatched. As someone who is extremely particular with my teeth, I wouldn‚Äôt want anyone else to touch them. Manhattan Dental Spa, you are truly amazing. Thank you.

originalText.text: Even though general mask precautions have been lifted in medical spaces all over, Manhattan Dental Spa still cares about all of their patients and practices safest preventive measures throughout the ongoing pandemic. Staff is tested regularly, the providers and the front desk staff is still masked, there are HEPA filters ON and RUNNING throughout the ENTIRE office space, making sure the filtration and ventilation quality is at the best level. If you request that your practitioner be in a higher level mask than a surgical mask or KN95, they are more than happy to oblige for longer procedures. Had a Saturday morning appointment today and I couldn‚Äôt be happier with the safety factor - next to no one in the entire office! As a patient that literally cannot afford to catch COVID, the providers‚Äô concern and implementation of precautions for all patients is unparalleled. It‚Äôs already hard enough to be up-to-date on dental procedures - Manhattan Dental Spa goes above and beyond to help each patient to do so! Love them!

originalText.text: very friendly and communicative. Office was clean and welcoming, and I  barely had to wait to be seen. I expressed some interest in invisalign during my cleaning and was able to chat with someone right after my visit to answer my questions.
